projects.projectWelcomeText: Welcome to the Project Section of my Portfolio! Here, you'll find a curated collection of my work, showcasing a range of skills and interests. For each project, there's a direct link to its GitHub repository, offering a deeper dive into the code and processes behind my creations. Enjoy exploring!
projects.projectCorso: Website for an electrical company that promotes electrical construction and repair services, tracks the progress of ongoing projects, and manages users and reports.
projects.projectPetClinic: This is a multi-section, multi-year project that teaches students about Scrum, version control, issue management, TDD, CI, and so much more. It is based off the the spring petclinic microservices.

testimonies.testimoniesText: If you have any questions or anything interesting to tell me, feel free to get in touch with me!

about.aboutDescription: Hello! My name is Karina Sofia Evangelista, I am a 20 year old Computer Science student currently studying at Champlain College! Feel free to explore my about me page to learn more about who I am, what I do and what makes me, me!
about.aboutWhatIDoDescription: I am a Computer Science student currently studying at Champlain College. I am a hardworking, dedicated, and passionate individual who is always eager to learn and grow. I am a quick learner and I am always open to new opportunities and experiences. I am a very creative person and I love to express my creativity through my work and my hobbies. I am always open to new opportunities and experiences and I am always looking for ways to improve and grow as a person and as a professional.
about.frontEndTechnologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Vue.js, Angular
about.backEndTechnologies: Node.js, Python, Java, C#, Ruby, PHP
about.databaseTechnologies: MySQL, PostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL Server, MongoDB, Cassandra, Redis

carouselItems1.title: Caring
carouselItems1.text: I love bringing snacks for my friends and classmates to make them happy!
carouselItems1.text2: I work best in a team and enjoy collaborating with others!
carouselItems1.text3: I love creating new things and thinking outside the box!
carouselItems1.text4: I work hard to achieve my goals and never give up!
carouselItems1.text5: I enjoy interacting with people and making new friends!
